topic.title: How do Verification and Validation Differ?
topic.pre: I see "verify" and "validate" used interchangeably during testing, is this a big deal? We will dig through the differences, applications, and some thoughts on their usages in this first installation of my blog.
topic.main:
According to the glossary of ISTQB, they are defined as follows:
Verification: confirmation by examination and through provision of objective evidence that specified requirements have been fulfilled.
Validation: confirmation by examination and through provision of objective evidence that the requirements for a specific intended use or application have been fulfilled.
